DOC.brief_summary: The goal clinical trial determine individual-level genetic metabolic characteristic modify response cholecalciferol treatment . This study double blind , parallel design , randomize clinical trial ass genetic metabolic characteristic modify response cholecalciferol treatment . . Eligible participant randomly assign receive cholecalciferol treatment ( 2,000 international unit cholecalciferol daily mouth ) placebo 3:1 ratio total duration 16-weeks . The planned sample size 1,600 . The primary aim study identify genetic polymorphism , clinical characteristic , biomarkers modify biologic response vitamin D3 treatment , assess change serum concentration parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) 1,25 ( OH ) 2D urine calcium excretion .
DOC.brief_title: Individualized Response Vitamin D Treatment Study
DOC.criteria: 1,600 participant MultiEthnic Study Atherosclerosis ( MESA ) study return schedule 6th MESA study visit . Participants recruit four field center : Wake Forest University , WinstonSalem , NC ; Columbia University , New York , NY ; Northwestern University , Evanston , IL ; Johns Hopkins University , Baltimore , MD . 1 . Current use > 1,000 international unit ( IU ) cholecalciferol daily 2 . Current use activate vitamin D product ( calcitriol , paricalcitol , hectorol ) 3 . Known history allergy adverse reaction vitamin D treatment 4 . Known clinical history primary hyperparathyroidism 5 . Known clinical history kidney stone within previous 5 year 6 . Current participation another interventional study 7 . Inability provide write informed consent
